attributes.action: Enforce a "Vote of no confidence" within parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
"People shouldn't be afraid of their government. Governments should be afraid of their people"
We the people of The United Kingdom want a Re-Election. We will not stand by as you abuse us as people, insult us as a nation. It is time we, the people, were listened to.
attributes.background: This GREAT Country of ours is falling apart. The government are going back on many of their "promised" election manifestos, cutting more money from the disabled and the poor, while giving tax breaks to the rich. The country has lost faith in this government, even the PM's own party are revolting.
